root.name: Street Rod
root.description: OverviewThe game is set in the early 60's, at the start you're given a small amount of money to buy your first car, you then race this car against other custom cars in the neighbourhood to earn money and customise your car. The GarageRacingTo race you car you cruise to "Bob's Diner" where opponents will pull up beside you and you can choose a suitable opponent to race. Once you have chosen an opponent you can choose from 2 types of racing, road race or drag race. Next you place bets on winning the race, you can bet upto $100 or race for "pink slips" which means if you win you get to keep your opponents car.
